titles.title: FAA Aviation Safety Research Assessment Act of 2007

To authorize an independent review of the Federal Aviation Administration's aviation safety-related research programs, and in particular those programs related to air traffic control and runway safety, and for other purposes.
FAA Aviation Safety Research Assessment Act of 2007

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science and Technology.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Space and Aeronautics.

bill.summary: FAA Aviation Safety Research Assessment Act of 2007 - Directs the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) to enter into an arrangement with the National Research Council to provide for an independent review of the FAA's aviation safety-related research programs.
